lines.text:
[to his hostage in a movie theater]
Damn kid! Watching Cat III movies? You're under 18!
[shoots him dead]
A pen can't kill bad guys.
According to experts, drinking coffee represents your sex life. So, that means you don't like doing it with your wife.
You must be 'Bad Odor' Chuan.
How dare you call me names!
Honey, do you wear that dress to lure people for sex?
That's none of your business.
Honey, shall we go to see a show some day?
When there's moonlight on New Year's Eve.
[smiles at Happy as she leaves]
She's smiling at me.
She's smiling at you only because you're a lout.
Hey, got a cigarette?
No.
A cop without cigarettes out of 30,000 in Hong Kong?
Hey, Bitch. Don't be so cocky.
Why don't you rape me!
Sorry, Madam. I won't be such a fink.
[to Chuan, in English]
Eat yourself!
Repeat that in Chinese, please.
Enroll in Josiah Lau's English class, kid.

[after being burned with a barrel of boiling water]
Kindness has good returns!
[after her boyfriend, Chu Li-Yin, has been murdered and the killer exits the bathroom and appears in silhouette]

[to herself]
Why has he changed so quickly? Is he a plastic surgeon?
Only the wicked win in this business society.

[after getting shot by Happy Chiu]
I must kill that four-eyed cop!

[to 'Bitch' Yuen Ying]
You can't clean your mouth with water. Use acid, idiot.
I'm a catholic. I never lie.
You may curse my mom, but not my wife.
Okay. Curse mom.
Curse my auntie then, if not my mom.
I'll get guns. You call the police.
How do I do that? I've never done that before.
You're taking the law into your own hands!
[He is shot dead by a machine gunman]
I hate people who don't observe game rules.
I hate people who don't observe game rules.
What is it?
I've caught one of the cops and 'Bitchy' Ying, undressed them and tied them up. I'll torture them later.
You never change! You're so naughty!
[after Chuan runs around naked during the final gunfight]
Ha, ha! I've got a gun at last! I'm still naked, though. Let me cover up.
[Puts a bag over his head]
[after kicking a pen through Fu's chest and killing him]
Wow. So, a pen can kill people.
[before Te drops Li Peng off a roof]
I never lie... but today's an exception.
